patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -17,8 +17,24 @@
           container,
           license: "YOUR_PSPDFKIT_LICENSE_KEY",
           document: props.document,
           baseUrl: `${window.location.protocol}//${window.location.host}/${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}`,
+          annotations: {
+            color: '#FF0000', // Red color
+            opacity: 0.5,     // Semi-transparent
+            thickness: 2,     // 2-point thickness
+            allowEditing: true,   // Allow users to edit annotations
+            allowDeleting: true,  // Allow users to delete annotations
+            defaultAnnotationType: 'highlight', // Default annotation type is highlight
+            annotationToolbarItems: [
+              'highlight',
+              'ink',
+              'text',
+              'note',
+              'stamp',
+              // Add or remove other tools as needed
+            ],
+          },
         });
       } catch (error) {
         console.error("Error loading PSPDFKit:", error);
       }

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -17,42 +17,8 @@
           container,
           license: "YOUR_PSPDFKIT_LICENSE_KEY",
           document: props.document,
           baseUrl: `${window.location.protocol}//${window.location.host}/${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}`,
-          annotations: {
-            color: '#FF0000',           // Annotation color (default: '#FF0000')
-            opacity: 0.5,               // Annotation opacity (default: 1.0)
-            thickness: 2,               // Annotation thickness (default: 1)
-            readOnly: false,            // Annotations are read-only (default: false)
-            allowEditing: true,         // Allow users to edit annotations (default: true)
-            allowDeleting: true,        // Allow users to delete annotations (default: true)
-            defaultAnnotationType: 'highlight', // Default annotation type (highlight, ink, etc.)
-            annotationToolbarItems: [   // Annotation toolbar items
-              'highlight',
-              'ink',
-              'text',
-              'note',
-              'stamp',
-              'link',
-              'ink-eraser',
-              'rectangle',
-              'ellipse',
-              'line',
-              'arrow',
-              'polyline',
-              'polygon',
-              'image',
-              'video',
-              'audio',
-              'attachment',
-            ],
-            annotationStyle: {          // Custom annotation styles
-              fontSize: 12,             // Font size (default: 12)
-              backgroundColor: '#FFFF00', // Background color (default: '#FFFF00')
-              borderColor: '#000000',   // Border color (default: '#000000')
-              borderWidth: 1,           // Border width in points (default: 1)
-            },
-          },
         });
       } catch (error) {
         console.error("Error loading PSPDFKit:", error);
       }
